statements: SELECT * FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT employee_id, department FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE race_ethnicity = 'Black';
SELECT gender, tenure_years FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY tenure_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE tenure_years >= 5 AND race_ethnicity = 'Hispanic' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(tenure_years) AS avg_tenure_years, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics GROUP BY gender;
SELECT * FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY tenure_years DESC;
SELECT employee_id, gender, race_ethnicity FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE race_ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY gender ASC, tenure_years DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department, tenure_years FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE tenure_years > 5 AND (gender = 'Female' OR race_ethnicity = 'White') ORDER BY department ASC, tenure_years DESC;
SELECT employee_id, race_ethnicity FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE department = 'Marketing' AND tenure_years BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_inclusion_metrics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY department DESC, tenure_years ASC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT gender, ethnicity FROM diversity_metrics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM inclusion_metrics WHERE team_satisfaction_score >= 90;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM diversity_metrics GROUP BY department;
SELECT employee_id, inclusion_training_completed FROM inclusion_metrics WHERE diversity_hiring_goal_met = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender ASC, employee_id DESC
SELECT employee_id, ethnicity FROM diversity_metrics WHERE department = 'Sales'
SELECT employee_id, team_satisfaction_score FROM inclusion_metrics WHERE inclusion_training_completed = TRUE ORDER BY team_satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM inclusion_metrics WHERE diversity_hiring_goal_met = TRUE AND team_satisfaction_score > 80
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM diversity_metrics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT department, hire_date FROM diversity_metrics ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_goals WHERE completion_status=true;
SELECT employee_name, feedback_text FROM inclusion_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date;
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM diversity_metrics WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM diversity_metrics WHERE ethnicity = 'African American';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM diversity_metrics ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, feedback_date FROM inclusion_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT employee_id, age, hire_date FROM diversity_metrics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM diversity_initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM inclusion_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM diversity_metrics WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, gender, age FROM diversity_metrics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT employee_id, ethnicity FROM diversity_metrics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM inclusion_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM DiversityAndInclusionMetrics;
SELECT employee_id, department, gender FROM DiversityAndInclusionMetrics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT department, ethnicity, age FROM DiversityAndInclusionMetrics ORDER BY ethnicity ASC;
SELECT id, hire_date FROM DiversityAndInclusionMetrics WHERE department = 'Human Resources';
SELECT id, employee_id, department FROM DiversityAndInclusionMetrics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 25;
SELECT * FROM DiversityAndInclusionMetrics WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC, hire_date ASC;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM DiversityAndInclusionMetrics GROUP BY department ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT INITIATIVE_NAME, description FROM CompanyInitiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND initiative_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE date_submitted >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_submitted DESC, employee_id;
SELECT training_name, duration_hours, training_date FROM InclusionTraining WHERE duration_hours > 2 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
